This is by far the best Counter Strike version. The graphics have significantly improved from CS Source and the most annoying thing about CS is now fixed, which is getting blocked by teammates or traffic jams near doors. Also the detail of the maps has improved and the weapons feel slightly improved. All of this while retaining the classic Counter Strike feel that we all loved about CS 1.6 and CS Source.
Great game to play with friends ;)
